Series I: Writings, Articles and Notes

Writings, Notes: "American Jewry in the Affairs of the Jewish People"/ "Winning the Jewish Masses for the Progressive Party"/ "Henry Wallace and 6 Million Jobs"/ "Review of 'Milestones in Stalin's Life'"/ "Jerusalem, National Independence, and Peace"/ "Reverse Wall Street's Verdict and Prevent the Outlawing of A Working Class Political Party"/ "Current Problems in Our Jewish Work". Notes: "Suggestions for Pamphlets"/ "Questions and Answers"/ Handwritten notes on the Economy
